# Clawster

> An AI desktop pet that watches your screen and helps you get things done.

Clawster is a screen-aware AI companion for macOS. It's a cute lobster that lives on your desktop, watches what you're doing, and can help you with context-aware assistance.

## Features

- **Quick Chat**: Press Cmd+Shift+Space to summon Clawster anywhere for contextual help
- **Screenshot Questions**: Press Cmd+Shift+/ to capture your screen and ask questions about it
- **12 Moods**: Happy, Crossed, Sleep, Idle, Peek, Side Eye, Doze, Startle, Proud, Huff, Spin, Walking
- **Powered by OpenClaw**: Runs locally with your own OpenClaw gateway for privacy

## Download

- macOS (Apple Silicon): https://github.com/wuyuwenj/clawster/releases/download/v0.1.3/Clawster-0.1.3-arm64.dmg

## Links

- Website: https://clawster.pet
